name: mailu
description: Mailu is a lightweight, self-hosted mail server solution built from Docker components. It includes webmail, admin UI, and optional components like antivirus and LDAP, ideal for private email hosting.

features.title: Admin Interface
features.description: Manage domains, users, and aliases through a clean web-based control panel

features.title: Webmail Options
features.description: Choose between Roundcube or Rainloop for webmail interface

features.title: End-to-End Encryption
features.description: Enforce encrypted connections for both incoming and outgoing mail traffic

features.title: Fetchmail Integration
features.description: Retrieve mail from external accounts and deliver to local mailboxes
